name: black-eyes
description: Daemon like server for ojos operation scripts - kind of performance research on server side performant IPC and data serialization

scripts.test: npm run build && npx ava --serial --concurrency 1 --config ava.config.js
scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && npm run copy
scripts.all: npm run clean   && npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.package: rm -rf asar dist out misc-utils-of-mine-generic *.zip && npm run build && cp -r node_modules/asar node_modules/misc-utils-of-mine-generic . && npx yackage --app-dir $PWD --platform linux dist  out &&  npx yackage --app-dir $PWD  dist  out && rm -rf misc-utils-of-mine-generic asar

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
